title: Outlook: Global Address List updates in new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
description: We are making some adjustments to the GAL search and browse experiences. Users will be asked to type in more characters to refine their search in some cases. There will be some other visual improvements in error messaging. Another way to find recipients is by using the suggestion dropdown picker in the To/Cc/Bcc lines. Note: We have updated the status and release date to reflect the current status.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
